id: scenario-value-scanner-idd-community-scenarios-family-participating in family decisions as adult member
title: Participating in family decisions as adult member
description: Participating in family decisions as adult member
content:
Scenario: Participating in family decisions as adult member
    Given Jordan's family is planning a vacation together
    And Jordan is invited to join the family trip
    When the family discusses vacation options
    Then Jordan participates in the planning with accessible support
    And the personal_agent presents destination options visually
    And Jordan can express preferences about activities and timing
    And Jordan's vote counts in family decision-making
    And the family treats Jordan as an adult participant, not a child
    And Jordan experiences being a valued family member with voice
